com.datastax.dse.driver.api.core.graph

Class ScriptGraphStatementBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.dse.driver.api.core.graph.GraphStatementBuilderBase<ScriptGraphStatementBuilder,ScriptGraphStatement>
      • com.datastax.dse.driver.api.core.graph.ScriptGraphStatementBuilder

  • @NotThreadSafe
public class ScriptGraphStatementBuilder
extends GraphStatementBuilderBase<ScriptGraphStatementBuilder,ScriptGraphStatement>
    A builder to create a script graph statement.

    This class is mutable and not thread-safe.

      • removeQueryParam

        @NonNull
public ScriptGraphStatementBuilder removeQueryParam(@NonNull
                                                             String name)
        Removes a parameter.

        This is useful if the builder was initialized with a template statement that has more parameters than desired.

        See Also:
        ScriptGraphStatement.setQueryParam(String, Object), clearQueryParams()
